(It's not really not made out of cloth, it's from a light, feather-
light metal.)

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> (Bot's got lion cloths? I didn't think they had anything to put a 
> lion cloth over? Gee these bots are evolving fast))
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, wilddance_mare@h... wrote:
> > Berserk:
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > Berserk watched as the fight between the Predacons and Bounty end 
> in 
> > a demise. This could be his chance to find out where he was. He 
> > bolted off behind the base with the loin cloth flying along with 
> him. 
> > He stopped, and looked passed the corner.
